name: Banette
description: BANETTE generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This POKéMON was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot be asleep.  This causes rest to fail altogether.  If a Pokémon is asleep and acquires this ability, it will immediately wake up; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.  This ability functions identically to vital spirit in battle.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers.  In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.effect: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
